ctx: intros a b Q Hred Hcanon Hcomb.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) b : list (Term A n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) Hred : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (pO A n) b Hcanon : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pO A n) Unable to unify "CombLinear ?M2234 (pO A n)" with "CombLinear Q b".

ctx: intros a b Q Hred Hcanon Hcomb.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros a b Q Hred Hcanon Hcomb.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) b : list (Term A n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) s : list (Term A n) Hred : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q s b Hcanon : canonical A0 eqA ltM s a : Term A n p, q : list (Term A n) H : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a H0 : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q Q Hcomb : CombLinear Q p H1 : eqP A eqA n s (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a q) p) IHHcomb : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p b -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> CombLinear Q b Unable to unify "CombLinear ?M2234 s" with "CombLinear Q b".

ctx: intros a b Q Hred Hcanon Hcomb.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) b : list (Term A n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) s : list (Term A n) Hred : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q s b Hcanon : canonical A0 eqA ltM s a : Term A n p, q : list (Term A n) H : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a H0 : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q Q Hcomb : CombLinear Q p H1 : eqP A eqA n s (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a q) p) IHHcomb : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p b -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> CombLinear Q b Unable to unify "eqP A eqA n s (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a q) p)" with "reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p b".

original: intros a b Q Hred Hcanon Hcomb. induction Hcomb. - apply CombLinear_0. - apply CombLinear_1 with (p:=p) (q:=q) (s:=s). + apply H. + apply H0. + apply IHHcomb. + apply H1.
